column4: Nvedia Driver issue: Attempting to activate driver through "addition hardward" Error Msg: nvidia System Error: E:Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages
how do i manually remove it?
I doubt that this is the source package that is the problem
what is the output of dpkg --configure -a
assuming you have no issues there, I would recommend sudo apt-get install nvidia-current-updates        It is less buggy than nvidia-current (295.40)
do sudo apt-get update from terminal, and then do sudo apt-get install nvidia-current-updates
OK updates installed, get the same message, now?
the package is all screwed up, i need to remove it
did it error when you installed it?
Nope, when when I try to activiate the driver through "Addtional Hardware"
ignore that for now please and reboot
again, you have the most current driver available
